member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFindHandler.ProcessRequest(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: This method takes in parameters of EntityID, or EntityName as well as the required parameter of FindParams. Find Params should be an XML formatted string that has the following format. Note that in the below findItem tag, fieldName is an optional attribute, if not specified the entity's NAME attribute is searched.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebFindHandler
member.summary: ASP.NET Handler class that handles server requests for a lookup functions. The ProcessRequest() method handles input parameters for 'Entity' as well as 'FindParams'
